title: How to Make Pimento Cheese Sandwiches

steps.headline: Add the grated cheese to a medium mixing bowl.
Add the mayonnaise and drained chopped pimentos to the cheese.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve as a sandwich or cracker spread.

text: Add the grated cheese to a medium mixing bowl.  Add the mayonnaise and drained chopped pimentos to the cheese.  Mix to combine.  Add salt and pepper to taste. Mix again. Serve as a sandwich or cracker spread.
